existing_features.title: Add a frontend page that allows a user to enter a domain string and save it as a draft, and to view the currently saved draft value and last-updated time.
Require Internet Identity login before allowing a domain draft to be saved from the frontend UI, and show a clear message when the user is not logged in.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow saving a domain as a draft (domain draft state management)
Implement backend persistence for a single "domain draft" value that can be saved and later retrieved, including metadata needed to understand when it was last saved.

projectName: Add domain draft state management (save domain as draft)
